nodes.text: The Blackscale or Blackscale Clan were the ruling Trandoshan clan on Kashyyyk during the Galactic Civil War. They oversaw the capture of Wookiee slaves, from their compound north of Kachirho and the Avatar Orbital Platform in orbit above the planet. They were led by Lord Cyssc Blackscale and had a long-standing feud with the rival Zssik Clan.

After the Battle of Yavin, a group of slavers of the Blackscale Clan led by slavemaster Trussk was based in the city of Keren, on the planet Naboo. Around 1 ABY, Trussk and his slavers captured the Wookiee Arrworr and shipped him to Naboo. Around the same time, the Blackscale Clan was tracking a smuggler known as Cal Handro. Trussk wanted him dead for having smuggled slaves for a rival Trandoshan clan. At some point, a group of spacers attacked Trussk's fortress on Naboo. These adventurers were investigating the disappearance of Cal Handro and suspected the Blackscale Clan to have captured him. A violent fight erupted and most slavers were killed, including slavemaster Trussk.

The Blackscale Clan appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
